Sentencas: We have used molecular dynamics simulations and energy minimization calculations to examine defect energetics and oxygen diffusion in ytttia-stabilized zirconia (YSZ).
Titulo: Computer simulation of defects and oxygen transport in yttria-stabilized zirconia

Sentencas: Oxygen vacancies prefer to be second nearest neighbors to yttrium dopants.
Titulo: Computer simulation of defects and oxygen transport in yttria-stabilized zirconia

Sentencas: The oxygen diffusion coefficient shows a peak at 8 mol% yttria consistent with experimental findings.
Titulo: Computer simulation of defects and oxygen transport in yttria-stabilized zirconia

Sentencas: The activation energy for oxygen diffusion varies from 0.6 to 1.0 eV depending on the yttria content.
Titulo: Computer simulation of defects and oxygen transport in yttria-stabilized zirconia

Sentencas: The Y-Zr'-V-O-Y-Zr' complex with a binding energy of -0.85 eV may play an important role in any conductivity degradation of YSZ.
Titulo: Computer simulation of defects and oxygen transport in yttria-stabilized zirconia
